room_title: Escape room "Zombie Bomb" by Escape Room Zone in Detroit
room_description: Unbornlabs has an evil plan to unleash a Zombie Virus and their lead scientist had an accident and infected himself. Due to inactivity in the lab it has gone into self destruct mode! The only person that knows the code to disarm the bomb is the Lead Scientist that has been infected. Your mission is to get inside, find the cure, save the lead scientist so you can get the code and disarm the bomb before it explodes!
